title: [Large-scale] Workshop on Designing Digital Game-Based Language Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic digital tools and experience in language education
context.additional_context: A short-term intensive program implementing a game-based learning environment through participatory design in a smartphone-centric, limited technological environment

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more language learning scenarios incorporating digital game elements.
Learners can complete game prototypes incorporating peer feedback using collaboration tools.
Learners can explain two or more microlearning game mechanisms applicable in mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
